Topic.Title: Ask NPC about  about two word objects?

Posts.EditableText:
Hi, I need a little help with the Ask/Tell tab.  How do you ask an NPC about something which is two or more words rather than one?

E.g. ask npc about security guard or ask npc about security office

Quest picks the first one in the list at the moment.
Posts.HTML:
Hi, I need a little help with the Ask/Tell tab. How do you ask an NPC about something which is two or more words rather than one?

E.g. ask npc about security guard or ask npc about security office

Quest picks the first one in the list at the moment.

Posts.EditableText:
I just tried it out, and it works okay for me.

> > ask mary about security office
> About security office
>
> > ask mary about security guard
> About security guard
Posts.HTML:
I just tried it out, and it works okay for me.

> ask mary about security office
About security office

> ask mary about security guard
About security guard

Posts.EditableText: Well, I've no idea what I did.  Deleted all the ASK and recreated and they all now work.  PICNIC problem I guess (_problem in chair not in computer_).  Thanks Pixie.
Posts.HTML: Well, I've no idea what I did. Deleted all the ASK and recreated and they all now work. PICNIC problem I guess (problem in chair not in computer). Thanks Pixie.
